item.description:
Let's visit the Brazil's "Cisne Branco" and Portugal's "Sagres" ships.

I will confirm the exact meeting location as we approach the date.

For now, mark your calendars.

The Tall Ships Festival runs from July 8th to the 12th.


http://www.sailboston...

*************update 7/85/09****************************

Saturday's Schedule for the Tall Ships


  • Public Access to Piers
    * Specific times for public ship tours will be determined by each vessel's captain.


    • 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM* - Charlestown Navy Yard, Pier 1 and Pier 4
    • 12:00 PM - 8:00 PM* - Fish Pier; Seaport World Trade Center


  • 12:00 PM - 4:00 PM - Seaport Music in the Park South Boston Maritime Park
  • 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM - Tall Ships Atlantic Challenge Awards Ceremony South Boston Maritime Park


Portugal and Brazil Tall Ships are docked at the Fish Pier

******
Lets meet at South Station at 12noon and walk towards Fish Pier and check out the festivities (the music at the South Boston Maritime Park) in between.

There is food court with seating inside the station.
Lets meet at the Au Bon Pain at 12noon. I will wait 15 minutes.
Feel free to email me if you have any questions or would like to make arrangements to meet later.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tall Ships - Lets visit the Brazil and Portuguese ships
